mapper.insert:
select NOTICE_SEQ.nextval from dual
insert into notice(notice_No, notice_Title, notice_Content) values(#{noticeNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{noticeContent})
mapper.select: select * from ( select rownum as RNUM, A.* from ( select * from notice order by notice_no desc )A ) where RNUM>#{firstRecordIndex} and RNUM<=#{firstRecordIndex}+ #{recordCountPerPage}
mapper.update: update notice set NOTICE_READCOUNT = NOTICE_READCOUNT+1 where NOTICE_NO=#{noticeNo}
